Name: TheLastHope
About the game: The Last Hope is a Metroidvania-style platform game with RPG elements, in which the player controls an unnamed character who is transported against his will to the underworld, and now has to discover how to escape and how to survive the dangers around him. The game features: great exploration, more than 10 different bosses item upgrades, more than 350 maps puzzles more than 10 types of powers more than 4 types of magic two different endings and many different types of enemies...
